alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:46AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Teton County through 715 AM MDT... At 644 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moose, moving east northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Localized winds of 30 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds will create choppy waters on area lakes. If you can hear thunder, you can be struck by lightning. Seek shelter immediately. This thunderstorm will be near... Kelly around 650 AM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Gros Ventre Campground, Crystal Creek Campground, Buffalo Ranger Station, Jenny Lake, Jenny Lake Lodge, Jackson Hole Airport and Hatchet Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
